languages.text: "Техножрецы утверждают, что привилегии Механикус обязывают Орден передать им святой археотех. Якобы Горнило надлежит считать не принадлежавшим святому, а предоставленным во временное владение. Орден Молота решительно отвергает этот тезис, настаивая, что право ухода за святынями принадлежит культам Экклезиархии, а раз Когнаций причислен к лику святых, то Горнило должно рассматриваться как благословенная реликвия, а не археотех".

"The Tech-Priests claim that the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand any sacred archeotech over to them. They argue that the Crucible should be considered not a personal possession of the saint, but rather an object temporarily entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for such sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not archeotech."
languages.original_text: "Техножрецы утверждают, что привилегии Механикус обязывают Орден передать им святой археотех. traits.locale_text: "The Tech-priests claim that the privileges of the Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand the sacred archeotech over to them. Allegedly, the Crucible should be considered not as the personal belonging of the saint, but rather as a temporary possession entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for the sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not an archeotech".

languages.text: “技术神甫声称，根据机械修会的特权规定，重锤修会有义务将神圣的远古科技造物交给他们。熔炉不应当被视为圣人的个人财产，它应该是被委托给圣人照顾的临时财产。重锤修会拒绝承认这样的观点，坚持认为照顾这些圣物的权利属于国教教会，既然科尼亚蒂乌斯被封为圣人，那么熔炉就应该被视为受祝福的遗物，而非远古科技造物。”
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests claim that the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand any sacred archeotech over to them. Allegedly, the Crucible should be considered not as the personal belonging of the saint, but rather as a temporary possession entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for these sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not archeotech."

traits.locale_text: “技术神甫声称，根据机械修会的特权规定，重锤修会有义务将神圣的远古科技造物交给他们。熔炉不应当被视为圣人的个人财产，它应该是被委托给圣人照顾的临时财产。重锤修会拒绝承认这样的观点，坚持认为照顾这些圣物的权利属于国教教会，既然科尼亚蒂乌斯被封为圣人，那么熔炉就应该被视为受祝福的遗物，而非远古科技造物。”

languages.text: «Los tecnosacerdotes afirman que los privilegios del Mechanicus obligan a la Orden del Martillo a entregarles cualquier arqueotecnología sagrada. Supuestamente, el Crisol no debe considerarse una pertenencia personal del santo, sino una posesión temporal confiada a su cuidado. La Orden del Martillo rechaza esta idea, insistiendo en que el derecho a cuidar de estos objetos sagrados pertenece a los cultos de la Eclesiarquía, y puesto que Cognatius fue canonizado, el Crisol debe considerarse una reliquia bendita, no arqueotecnología».
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests claim that the privileges of the Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand any sacred archeotech over to them. Allegedly, the Crucible should be considered not as the personal belonging of the saint, but rather as a temporary possession entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for these sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not archeotech".

traits.locale_text: «Los tecnosacerdotes afirman que los privilegios del Mechanicus obligan a la Orden del Martillo a entregarles cualquier arqueotecnología sagrada. Supuestamente, el Crisol no debe considerarse una pertenencia personal del santo, sino una posesión temporal confiada a su cuidado. La Orden del Martillo rechaza esta idea, insistiendo en que el derecho a cuidar de estos objetos sagrados pertenece a los cultos de la Eclesiarquía, y puesto que Cognatius fue canonizado, el Crisol debe considerarse una reliquia bendita, no arqueotecnología».

languages.text: 「技術司祭は、メカニクスの特権により、鉄槌の修道会は神聖な技術遺産を自分達に引き渡す義務があると主張しています。真偽のほどは別として、坩堝は聖人の個人的な所有物ではなく、聖人に管理が託された一時的な所持品と考えるべきであると言われています。鉄槌の修道会はこの論拠を否定し、これらの神聖な品々を管理する権利は、帝国聖教会の魔女団にあると主張しているうえ、コグナティウスが神聖な地位を与えられた以上、坩堝は技術遺産ではなく、祝福された聖遺物とみなされるべきと申し立てています。
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests claim that the privileges of the Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand any sacred archeotech over to them. Allegedly, the Crucible should be considered not as the personal belonging of the saint, but rather as a temporary possession entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for these sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not archeotech".

traits.locale_text: 「技術司祭は、メカニクスの特権により、鉄槌の修道会は神聖な技術遺産を自分達に引き渡す義務があると主張しています。真偽のほどは別として、坩堝は聖人の個人的な所有物ではなく、聖人に管理が託された一時的な所持品と考えるべきであると言われています。鉄槌の修道会はこの論拠を否定し、これらの神聖な品々を管理する権利は、帝国聖教会の魔女団にあると主張しているうえ、コグナティウスが神聖な地位を与えられた以上、坩堝は技術遺産ではなく、祝福された聖遺物とみなされるべきと申し立てています。

languages.text: « Les technoprêtres prétendent que de par les privilèges du Mechanicus, l'Ordre du Marteau est contraint de leur céder toute forme d'archéotechnologie sacrée. Selon eux, le Creuset ne devrait pas être considéré comme la propriété personnelle du saint, mais plutôt comme un objet confié temporairement à sa garde. L'Ordre du Marteau réfute cette thèse en insistant sur le fait que le droit de protéger ces objets sacrés revient aux cultes de l'Ecclésiarchie ; de plus, Cognatius ayant été canonisé, le Creuset doit être considéré comme une relique sainte, et non comme un artefact archéotechnologique. »
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests claim that the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand any sacred archeotech over to them. Allegedly, the Crucible should be considered not as the personal belonging of the saint, but rather as a temporary possession entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for these sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not archeotech."

traits.locale_text: « Les technoprêtres prétendent que de par les privilèges du Mechanicus, l'Ordre du Marteau est contraint de leur céder toute forme d'archéotechnologie sacrée. Selon eux, le Creuset ne devrait pas être considéré comme la propriété personnelle du saint, mais plutôt comme un objet confié temporairement à sa garde. L'Ordre du Marteau réfute cette thèse en insistant sur le fait que le droit de protéger ces objets sacrés revient aux cultes de l'Ecclésiarchie ; de plus, Cognatius ayant été canonisé, le Creuset doit être considéré comme une relique sainte, et non comme un artefact archéotechnologique. »

languages.text: "Die Techpriester sagen, der Orden des Hammers sei wegen der Privilegien der Mechanicus verpflichtet, ihnen jede heilige Archäotech auszuhändigen. Der Tiegel ist in ihren Augen nicht als persönlicher Besitz des Heiligen anzusehen. Er sei lediglich vorübergehend in seine Obhut gegeben worden. Der Orden des Hammers weist diese Theorie zurück und besteht darauf, dass das Recht, sich um diese heiligen Gegenstände zu kümmern, den Kults der Ekklesiarchie zusteht. Und da Cognatius kanonisiert wurde, ist der Tiegel als gesegnete Reliquie anzusehen, nicht als Archäotech."
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests claim that the privileges of the Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand any sacred archeotech over to them. Allegedly, the Crucible should be considered not as the personal belonging of the saint, but rather as a temporary possession entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for these sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not archeotech".

traits.locale_text: "Die Techpriester sagen, der Orden des Hammers sei wegen der Privilegien der Mechanicus verpflichtet, ihnen jede heilige Archäotech auszuhändigen. Der Tiegel ist in ihren Augen nicht als persönlicher Besitz des Heiligen anzusehen. Er sei lediglich vorübergehend in seine Obhut gegeben worden. Der Orden des Hammers weist diese Theorie zurück und besteht darauf, dass das Recht, sich um diese heiligen Gegenstände zu kümmern, den Kults der Ekklesiarchie zusteht. Und da Cognatius kanonisiert wurde, ist der Tiegel als gesegnete Reliquie anzusehen, nicht als Archäotech."

languages.text: "Tekno Rahipler, Adeptus Mechanicus haklarına göre Çekiç Tarikatı'nın elindeki tüm kutsal arkeotekleri kendilerine vermekle yükümlü olduğunu iddia ediyorlar. İddiaya göre Pota, azizin şahsi bir malı olarak değil, onun muhafazasına geçici olarak bırakılmış bir eşya olarak değerlendirilmeliymiş. Çekiç Tarikatı, bu savı reddederek kutsal nesnelerle ilgilenme hakkının Ekleşiarşi tarikatlarına ait olduğunda ve Cognatius'un kutsanmışlığı nedeniyle Pota'nın da bir arkeotekten ziyade kutsanmış bir yadigâr olarak değerlendirilmesi gerektiğinde ısrarcı."
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests claim that the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus oblige the Order of the Hammer to hand any sacred archeotech over to them. Allegedly, the Crucible should be considered not as the personal belonging of the saint, but rather as a temporary possession entrusted into his care. The Order of the Hammer rejects this thesis, insisting that the right to care for these sacred objects belongs to the Ecclesiarchy's cults, and since Cognatius was canonised, then the Crucible should be regarded as a blessed relic, not archeotech."
